title: Icons?
body: I participated in the Star Guardian quiz and the Worlds Pick'ems and haven't gotten icons for either. Both I have given a few days and haven't gotten ingame. Any advice or help is appreciated.

replies.body: The mark of the star guardian  can take up to 72 hours generally, but honestly it's just a matter of time.  The World's Pickem icons will be unlocked 3 days [after the event-](http://pickem.na.lolesports.com/en-US#how-to-play) October 30th!  Hang tight!
Oh, sorry! Thank you for the quick response.
